item.description:
Before signing up for this event, Please read the entire Write Up and understand and agree to the enclosed Liability Waiver.


Event Rating: Strenuous
Distance: 7.5 Miles
Time Duration: 3.5 Hours
Blaze Orange: REQUIRED



Hi Everyone ,

We  did this hike a back in December and it is  really nice hike . I am sure the waterfalls will be flowing pretty good  ..There is plenty to see on this hike and the trails are great .It is 7.5 miles with 800' of vertical rise and is classified as a moderate to strenuous hike at a fast pace .There are lots of little hills so be prepared to work for it .The hike boast a 60' high waterfall ( could be a trickle ) along with  the turbulent Eight Mile River ( or a dry river bed ) . Throughout this hike we will pass beneath groves of great trees , primarily hemlocks .There will be a little scrambling into the Devils Oven . The park is  also known for its giant trees.   The book estimates the time at 4.5 hours .It can l be done in a lot less time maybe 3 -3.5 hours .We will hike at a moderate to fast pace . Good foot ware required . Please bring  plenty of water ,food and insect repellent .  We will meet at the Park & Ride at 8:30 and carpool from there . It will take  about 45 minutes from there . We should  be at trail head by 9:20.

See you Saturday ,

Tony

Liability Waiver

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you for yourself, your heirs, executors, and administrators release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.

Safety First!

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: Devils Hopyard State Park Conn.
